pages.title: Dragonrot Swamp
pages.text: Lakes of $(l:dimension/dragonrot)Dragonrot$(/l) pervade the swamp-like thicket here.$(br)An acidic smell lingers in the air.
These small plants spread over the ground like ivy. In small clusters they grow in a clump of snapping green. When you fertilize them, they spread even further.
It's not dirt, it's not mud, it's... something - You don't know what. In any case, one sinks in a bit.
